    public class LegacyPermitOverridesPolicy
extends CombiningAlgorithmBase<PolicySetChild>
    LegacyPermitOverridesPolicy extends com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.combiners.CombiningAlgorithmBase for PolicySetChild elements implementing the XACML 1.0 permit-overrides policy combining algorithm.

      Evaluates as many of the CombiningElements supplied with the given CombinerParameters based on the particular combining algorithm and combines their EvaluationResults into a single EvaluationResult.

    • Method Detail

      • combine

        public EvaluationResult combine(EvaluationContext evaluationContext,
                       java.util.List<CombiningElement<PolicySetChild>> elements,
                       java.util.List<CombinerParameter> combinerParameters)
                         throws EvaluationException
        Description copied from interface: CombiningAlgorithm
        Evaluates as many of the CombiningElements supplied with the given CombinerParameters based on the particular combining algorithm and combines their EvaluationResults into a single EvaluationResult.
        Parameters:
        evaluationContext - the EvaluationContext in which to evaluate each of the CombiningElements
        elements - the List of CombiningElements to evaluate
        combinerParameters - the List of CombinerParameters to apply to the combining algorithm
        Returns:
        the combined EvaluationResult
        Throws:
        EvaluationException - if there is an error in the evaluate method of any of the CombiningElements
